column4: I have a Toshiba 7020CT laptop (366 mhz pentium II) and I just installed ubuntu on it. Everything works GREAT -- except the screen resolution is locked in to 640x480 when it's capable of 1024x768. There are no other resolutions available besides 640x480 in the resolution settings.
how much RAM do you have on it? (not that it would affect your resolution)
you're lucky, Ive got an older one thats too slow for ubuntu with 40mb ;)
